block.text: When you use an arcane Cold power using this tome and the target is slowed, that target takes cold damage each time it moves while it remains slowed. The damage equals your Constitution modifier + this tome's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Spellbook
block.line: This tome contains two wizard daily Cold attack powers, chosen when it wsa created. Both powers must be of a level equal to or lower than that of the tome. If the tome's level is incresed, one or both powers can be exchanged for new ones.
Level 18, 23 or 28Three wizard Cold attack powers, one of which can be an encounter power.
If you have the wizard class feature Arcane Spellbook, these spells count as being in your spellbook.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have at least one unexpended arcane daily attack power of a level equal to or higher than a power in this tome's Spellbook.
Level 18, 23 or 28You can also use this power if you have an unexpended arcane encounter attack power of a level equal to or higher than an encounter power in this tome's Spellbook.

EffectYou expend an arcane daily attack power, and gain use of a daily attack power from this tome's Spellbook that is of a level equal to or lower than the power you expended. If you do not use this power by the end of the encounter, it is lost without effect.
Level 18, 23 or 28You can instead expend an arcane encounter attack power to gain use of an encounter attack power.

item.title: Totem of Thunder's Keeper
item.fluff: A stylized face carved into this totem animates with an angry growl to rebuff those who harm your allies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy within 10 squares of you hits your spirit companion or an ally within 5 squares of you with a melee attack

EffectClose burst 10 (triggering enemy); The target takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus, and you push it a number of squares equal to the totem's enhancement bonus.
Level 12 or 17Thunder damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 22 or 27Thunder damage equal to 6 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Totem of Trailblazing
item.fluff: This simple stone has the faded image of a campsite painted upon it

item.title: Utility Wand
item.fluff: A boon to practical spellcasters, this wand increases the range of one's utility spells

block.name: Property
block.line: Increase the range of your ranged arcane utility powers and the distance within which you can create the area of an area arcane utility power by a number of squares equal to this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Verdant Staff
item.fluff: This writhing staff is composed of thin vines that constantly flourish and wither

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when used with a primal power

block.name: Property
block.line: A primal character proficient with totem implements can use this staff as a totem implement.

item.title: Vicious Rod
item.fluff: This rod enhances the deadliness of your curse

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a creature under your curse

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal your Warlock's Curse damage, you deal +1 damage for each die.

item.title: Wand of Fiery Horder
item.fluff: This red lacquer wand resembles a miniature totem pole of impish creatures

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire and psychic damage per plus

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with the winged horde wizard at-will attack

block.name: Property
block.text: When you use the winged horde wizard at-will attack, it has the Fire keyword and deals fire and psychic damage.

block.name: Winged Horde
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each enemy in the burst); Intelligence vs. Will
Hit 1d6 fire and psychic damage, and the target cannot take immediate actions until the end of your next turn.
Level 23 or 282d6 fire and psychic damage.
EffectThe target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Wand of Inevitability
item.fluff: This wand, crafted from light, supple wood, allows you to accurately strike your enemies with a flick of the wrist

block.name: Property
block.line: If you miss every target of an at-will attack power made with this wand, you gain a +2 item bonus to all attack rolls with that power the first time you use it before the end of your next turn.
If you miss all targets when you have this bonus, the item bonus increases by a cumulative +1 and lasts until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Wand of Missile Mastery
item.fluff: This dark wooden staff empowers a wizard's most basic attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When use your magic missile attack power with this implement, you gain an item bonus to the damage equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your magic missile attack power
EffectYou can target one or two creatures with the triggering attack. No target can be more than 5 squares away from any other target.
Level 22 or 27Target one, two, or three creatures.

item.title: Wand of Radiance
item.fluff: A pinpoint of light dances on the tip of this wand

block.name: Dire Radiance
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 186 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus radiant damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and 10 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus radiant damage.
EffectThe first square of movement the target takes towards you before the start of your next turn costs an additional square.

item.title: Wand of Sleep and Charm
item.fluff: The crystal eye atop this dusky birch wand enhances spells that target the mind

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with arcane Charm or Sleep powers.
This increases to a +2 item bonus if the power deals no damage.

item.title: Wrath of Nature Totem
item.fluff: This totem quivers with the pent-up forces of nature, waiting to be released when your wrath is unleashed

item.title: Watchful Spirit Totem
item.fluff: Several animal faces seem to look out from this totem with wide eyes, and the magic, channeled through your spirit companion, lashes out at those who harm your allies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy that has attacked your ally since the end of your previous turn

item.title: Windsoul Ki Focus
item.fluff: This leather bag contains a dancing vortex of wind, which lends you its secrets

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: 1d4 damage per plus, and you push the target 1 square per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectYou push the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to this ki focus's enhancement bonus.
